title: App-Store-Connect-Mcp-Server
description: An MCP server for interacting with the App Store Connect API, offering tools for app, beta tester, bundle ID, device, and user management.
creator: JoshuaRileyDev

APP_STORE_CONNECT_KEY_ID.description: The Key ID for the App Store Connect API

APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.description: The Issuer ID for the App Store Connect API

APP_STORE_CONNECT_P8_PATH.description: The file path to the .p8 private key
